issue.title: [R] Improve documentation about CSV reader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9178](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9178). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Existing overview docs misleadingly state that our CSV reader isn't worth trying.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9178?focusedCommentId=17140194) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
